data.eml:eml: A new Anyphaena species from China (Araneae: Anyphaenidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zhang, Feng, Zhu, Ming-Sheng, Song, Da-Xiang (2005): A new Anyphaena species from China (Araneae: Anyphaenidae). Zootaxa 842: 1-7, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.170706
